channel.title: yudel tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from yudel.

item.description: In which I respond to and embrace @RabbiGoldberg’s call to abandon silence in the face of immorality. https://t.co/o6Qc9iSw1G
@Baalbatish1 And of course factually deficient. https://t.co/cRz5LAmiIP
@COScienceWriter @johnmcquaid @washingtonpost No, he’s exceptional in both sidesing.
@DrJackieMrsHajd @joshtpm @MetLife Hey, New Jersey Jewish counter history is my business!
@joshtpm Well, it does open up discussions of the relocation of @MetLife employees during the Lindbergh Administration.
@joshtpm Only Democratic candidate whose list notably didn’t honor my pressing the unsubscribe links.
@cwarzel Condolences on the loss of your capacity for schadenfreude.
@trekonomics There’s a reason China-linked billionaire Rupert Murdoch went all in on demonizing her as soon as she was elected.
@rmneiss “Israel not apartheid,” says anti-vax, anti-muppet senator from family linked to Kennedy assassination. That’s certainly one way to make the argument.
Today in Dylanology. https://t.co/Kssys6LWVz
@kavvanah Yes. Particularly since a local high school uses Tikvah for curriculum.
This is the future the Tikvah Fund wants. https://t.co/aJOaCUudrD
@rmneiss @kampeas Kinda hard to speak out for democracy in Israel when machers like Bernie Marcus are funding fascist youth movements in the USA.
Interesting. https://t.co/ufG217PrRJ
About to launch... https://t.co/t6mXMy7JHw https://t.co/myyZhTAHbJ
@ZellaQuixote @conspirator0 https://t.co/vLj7bfGUI7
@ZellaQuixote @conspirator0 I see it, on an iPhone.

In which a 20th century mystery series takes a turn into alt-history because the premise doesn’t work in the science fictional reality of the 2020s. https://t.co/gMjzya5u2J
Which is presumably why Fredric Brown, who excelled in both the mystery and science fiction genres, is name checked in the title.
Karen Berger tried to warn us. https://t.co/cHL5QFZCi7
@delong Given that male fidelity is good for the offspring, seeing your wife (and daughters) as uniquely human among females might be a good thing. #JustSoStories
@AD_Lobel No spring kitten. I hope she’ll do. https://t.co/zH5VVTQdPi
@trekonomics Actually, backlash from the British Invasion of 1964.
@ZacharyBraiterm @adamkotsko That gives me a Wordpress login screen. You’re linking to your feed reader, not the original article.

@davidbadash @mjs_DC The First Amendment is what SCOTUS says it is. No reason to believe the current court doesn’t want to roll back First Amendment jurisprudence by a century, when distributing birth control information was illegal.

@ZacharyBraiterm @adamkotsko Bad link however.
@ZacharyBraiterm @adamkotsko Did you mean this? https://t.co/gVgCMUkjVM
